description:
Being widowed after 30 years of marriage, I am mostly looking for no drama. I've had plenty of drama in my life and I'd like things to be calm. Mostly someone nice. Mean people are not fun. Someone to do things with. And hopefully something that leads to a lasting connection.
I was born and raised in Los Angeles and raised my kids in New Jersey. I go back and forth frequently, I have real estate in both places.
